text: Mantes-la-Ville is a French commune. It is located in the western suburbs of Paris, which is about 48.6 km (30.2 mi) from the center. About 18,710 people lived here in 2006. The mayor is Cyril Nauth since March 2014. == Education == * Institut des sciences et techniques des Yvelines * Universit√© de Versailles Saint-Quentin-en-Yvelines Category:Communes in Yvelines
title: Mantes-la-Ville
